title: Video: Lana Del Rey – Blue Jeans
body:
With the launch of **[Lana Del Rey’s](http://www.facebook.com/lanadelrey)** first single **_[Video Games](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9518-new-video-lana-del-rey-video-games/ "New & Video: Lana Del Rey – Video Games")_** just around the corner, coupled with the single’s launch party selling out within 24 hours; it’s safe to say **Lana Del Rey** has a bright future. And all this because of a simple yet eye wateringly beautiful video that dropped on YouTube those few months ago. A few hours ago Lana dropped her new video for the B-side, **_Blue Jeans_**. It’s a similar affair; borrowed vintage footage surrounding striking, dramatic yet personal shorts of Lana. Despite the repeated style, it still manages to tell a heart-breaking story. At times it’s goofy, the video’s voice tracks sometimes jumps into the music, the effect oscillating from the sublime to the ridiculous. Regardless, it’s brave, honest and mesmerising; just like Lana herself.

**_Video Games_** is released on October 7th, stream the new video below.
